title: Can Boris Johnson Juggle Two Special Relationships?
itunes:title: Can Boris Johnson Juggle Two Special Relationships?
description:
The Prime Minister refuses to weigh in on whether the U.S. killing of Iranian General Suleimani was legal. Equally, he hopes the EU-backed nuclear deal remains after the crisis, but can he keep both camps happy? Bloomberg Opinion's Therese Raphael explains the new normal for British diplomacy. Plus Tom O'Grady, lecturer in quantitative political science at UCL, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Caroline Hepker Labour will become more socially conservative to win back support.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
